message: Bob, I believe this product presents a unique opportunity and I'm pleased to offer it to you first. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $2,000,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  However, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer reflects. I'm willing to come down to $1,800,000.
I still think $1,200,000 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1,400,000, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.
